text: Ralph Morgan (July 6, 1883 - June 11, 1956) was an American movie, stage and character actor. He was the older brother of Frank Morgan. Morgan was the first President of the Screen Actors Guild. He appeared in over 100 movies and 35 stage shows. Morgan died in New York City from a heart attack, aged 72. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1883 births Category:1956 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Presidents of the Screen Actors Guild Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Ralph Morgan
